fields.comment: Love this pic.  Do you have any more?
reading this post I feel like I'm already there.
I visited after my wedding and I can't believe I haven't been back yet.
The pictures and the post make me feel like I'm already there.
If you go there in the summer you have to try Bernardo's kabobs.  Delicious!
This picture looks a little funny... I didn't think that angle was possible.
If you go remember to watch your wallet! They really go after the tourists there.
Your trip sounds fun, but I didn't enjoy mine.  Maybe I was there in the wrong time of year.
